questionTitle: ________ down the High Street, Peter bumped into Jenny.
Let us know as soon as possible so that we can start ________ arrangements.
It took about twenty minutes ________ to the station.
Yesterday the naval authorities ________ the report in Friday's newspapers that they had exploded three bombs near an unknown submarine.
He couldn't make the radio ________.
I don't believe a word you're saying. I think you've made the whole thing ________.
David was arrested because he had forgotten ________ for his shopping.
I felt a sharp ________ when I put my hand in the boiling water.
One ________ of their new house is that it has no garden.
I expect it will rain again when we're on holiday this year, but at least we are properly prepared ________ it this time.
Do you know anyone who's interested ________ having a kitten?
Psychiatrists spend a lot of time studying the mind. So ________ psychologists.
The firemen brought several long ________ to try to reach those trapped on the roof.
Be careful! Here's a wasps' nest. Don't ________ it.
The brothers are so alike I cannot ________ one from the other.
She wanted to borrow the record ________ me but she was shy of asking.
She is tall and slim, but her mother is fat. She ________ her father.
As the service charge is included in the bill, any further tipping is ________.
Many ________ crafts such as weaving are now being revived.
In a five-hour operation, surgeons managed to sew the boy's ________ hand back on.
